name: ERIEVIEW CARTAGE, INC., Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, BOARD OF FINANCE AND REVENUE, Appellee

parties: ERIEVIEW CARTAGE, INC., Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, BOARD OF FINANCE AND REVENUE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 25th day of June, 1998, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is affirmed. The Petition for Admission Pro Hac Vice is granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
711 A.2d 473
ERIEVIEW CARTAGE, INC., Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, BOARD OF FINANCE AND REVENUE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 25, 1998.
